room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by PanIQ Escape Room in Houston
review: Really great room and you can't beat the Groupon! It was challenging and had a variety of puzzles to solve. It wasn't just locks which was good. We escaped just in time and the staff was super friendly!

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by PanIQ Escape Room in Houston
review: We did the Wild West room and it was fun. I liked it more than the other escape rooms we've done because this one required more skills than just puzzle solving.

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by PanIQ Escape Room in Houston
review: The escape room was super fun. Went with coworkers/friends just for funsies to the Wild West Room and it was awesome. Definitely going to try the Military Bunker room next time.

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by PanIQ Escape Room in Houston
review: We were a group of six and we did the Wild West scenario. The puzzles and riddles took different parts of the brain to figure out.  hat made it more fun for everybody. One caution is the rooms are somewhat cramped, a little dark and kind of claustrophobic.

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by PanIQ Escape Room in Houston
review: My family and friends had a lot of fun escaping the Wild West room! I really liked how clever some of the puzzles were. Can't wait to do it again. The waiting/lobby area is quite bare; would be cool to have a photo area.

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by PanIQ Escape Room in Houston
review: We had so much fun in the Wild West room! We didn't quite make it but had a great time trying! It was so fun thanks!
